properties.name: spring.grpc.client.inprocess.enabled
properties.description: Whether to configure the in-process channel factory.

properties.name: spring.grpc.client.inprocess.exclusive
properties.description: Whether the inprocess channel factory should be the only channel factory available. When the value is true, no other channel factory will be configured.

properties.name: spring.grpc.client.observation.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Observations on the client.
